label: Borrero, Francisco J.  2012. A re-examinaton of the pleurodontid land snails from the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta region, Colombia, with the description of a new species of Isomera Albers (Gastropoda Pulmonata: Stylommatophora: Pleurodontidae). Archiv für Molluskenkunde 141(2): 214-231.
value: Borrero, Francisco J.  2012. A re-examinaton of the pleurodontid land snails from the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta region, Colombia, with the description of a new species of Isomera Albers (Gastropoda Pulmonata: Stylommatophora: Pleurodontidae). Archiv für Molluskenkunde 141(2): 214-231.
title: A re-examinaton of the pleurodontid land snails from the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta region, Colombia, with the description of a new species of Isomera Albers (Gastropoda Pulmonata: Stylommatophora: Pleurodontidae)
